DOC.brief_summary: To determine difference clinical pregnancy rate without luteal progesterone support young reproductive age population undergone ovulation induction combine clomiphene citrate gonadotropin protocol intrauterine insemination .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Luteal Progesterone Support Pregnancy Rates With Combined Clomid/ Gonadotropin & IUI
DOC.detailed_description: To determine difference clinical pregnancy rate without luteal progesterone support young reproductive age population undergone ovulation induction combine clomiphene citrate gonadotropin protocol intrauterine insemination . Patients randomize treatment arm control arm . The treatment arm receive luteal progesterone support control arm . Each arm 260 patient .
DOC.criteria: Age 1837 BMI 1934 kg/m2 Day 23 Follicle stimulate hormone ( FSH ) less 10IU/mL Estradiol ( E2 ) less 80 pg/mL Antimullerian hormone ( AMH ) 1.5 ng/mL ; antral follicle count ( AFC ) 10 Two patent fallopian tube confirm hysterosalpingogram ( HSG ) chromopertubation Normal uterine cavity confirm HSG , saline sonohysterogram ( SIS ) hysteroscopy Severe male factor ( total count le 10 million sperm ) Systemic disease limit diabetes Pregnancy within 3 month More 1 prior cycle gonadotropin treatment Any ovarian cyst > 15mm persist > 1 month Endometrioma and/or Endometriosisstage III IV Submucosal uterine fibroid ; untreated endometrial polyp > 1 cm ; abnormal reproductive tract bleed Intolerance allergy study drug Substance abuse ( include alcohol tobacco ) History chemotherapy ( except gestational condition ) radiotherapy Minors adult capable consent
